item.title: ID-25 West at I-84 (Exit 201)
item.description: ID-25 West at I-84 (Exit 201). Use I-84/ID-25 West for Twin Falls. Use I-84 East for Burley. Kasota Road continues southbound.

item.title: End ID-27 North at ID-25
item.description: End ID-27 North at ID-25. Use ID-25 east for Rupert; ID-25 west for Twin Falls.

item.title: End ID-25 West at I-84
item.description: End ID-25 West at I-84 in Jerome. Use I-84 west to Wendell and Boise; use I-84 east to Twin Falls.

item.title: ID-25 West at US-93
item.description: ID-25 West at US-93 in Jerome County. Use US-93 South or ID-25 West for I-84.

item.title: ID-25 West at US-93
item.description: ID-25 West at US-93 in Jerome County. Turn right for US-93 north to Shoshone; left for US-93 south to Twin Falls. Continue straight for ID-25 west to Jerome.

item.title: ID-25 West - Hunt Jct.
item.description: ID-25 west at Hunt Jct. Hunt is the site of the Minidoka War Relocation Center, a Japanese Internment Camp during World War 2.

item.title: End ID-50 East at ID-25
item.description: End ID-50 East at ID-25 in Jerome County.

item.title: End ID-50 East at ID-25
item.description: End ID-50 East at ID-25. Turn right for ID-25 east to Eden and Hazelton. Continue straight for ID-25 west to Jerome.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 194
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 194 - ID-25/Ridgeway Road/Hazelton. ID-25 west leaves I-84 westbound here. The ID-25 shield is a newer style that has been appearing on guide signs recently.

item.title: ID-24 East/ID-25 West at ID-24/ID-25 Split
item.description: ID-24 East/ID-25 West at ID-24/ID-25 Split in Rupert. Turn right to continue west on ID-25; continue straight for ID-24 to I-84.

item.title: ID-24 East/ID-25 West Split in Rupert
item.description: ID-24 East/ID-25 West split in Rupert. Turn right for ID-25 to Paul; continue straight on ID-24 for Heyburn and Burley.

item.title: ID-24/ID-25 East to I-84
item.description: ID-24/ID-25 East to I-84 in Rupert

item.title: ID-24/ID-25 East to I-84
item.description: ID-24/ID-25 East to I-84 in Rupert

item.title: ID-24 East at ID-25 - Rupert
item.description: ID-24 East at ID-25 in Rupert. Turn left for ID-25 east to Pocatello; right for ID-24 East /ID-25 West to Burley and Heyburn. Use either direction for I-84. ID-25 joins ID-24 east through Rupert.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 194
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 194 - ID-25/Ridgeway Road/Hazelton. ID-25 west leaves I-84 westbound here. The ID-25 shield is a newer style that has been appearing on guide signs recently.

item.title: I-84 Exit 216 Offramp at ID-25/ID-77
item.description: I-84 Exit 216 offramp at ID-25/ID-77. Turn right for ID-77 south to Declo and Albion. Turn left for ID-25 west to Rupert.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 216
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 216 - ID-77/ID-25/Declo/Albion

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 194 Offramp at ID-25
item.description: I-84 - Exit 194 Offramp at ID-25. Turn right to continue west on ID-25 towards Hazleton. Turn left for Ridgeway Road. ID-25 east joins I-84 eastbound to Kasota Road.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 216
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 216 - ID-25/ID-77/Declo/Albion.

item.title: End ID-27 North at ID-25
item.description: End ID-27 North at ID-25. Use ID-25 east for Rupert; ID-25 west for Twin Falls.

item.title: End ID-27 North at ID-25
item.description: End ID-27 North at ID-25 in Paul.

item.title: ID-27 North Approaching ID-25
item.description: ID-27 North approaching ID-25 in Paul.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 216
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 216 - ID-77/Rupert/Declo. The ID-25 shield is omitted from the advanced signage, but is included at the sign at the interchange itself.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 216
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 216 - ID-25/ID-77/Declo/Albion. The ID-77 shield is missing from this sign, but is present in the advance signage, as well as on signs on the other direction.

item.title: ID-25 East at I-84/ID-25 East
item.description: ID-25 east at I-84 east (Exit 194) to Burley and Pocatello. ID-25 follows I-84 east 7 miles.

item.title: ID-25 East at I-84 West
item.description: ID-25 east at I-84 west (Exit 194) to Twin Falls. ID-25 continues east on I-84.

item.title: ID-25 East at ID-50
item.description: ID-25 east at ID-50 south. Use either ID-25 or ID-50 for I-84 access.

item.title: ID-25 East at ID-50 to Kimberly
item.description: ID-25 east to Eden and Hazelton, at ID-50 south to Kimberly.

item.title: ID-25 East at ID-50
item.description: ID-25 east approaching ID-50. Use either ID-50 south or ID-25 east for I-84. ID-25 east parallels I-84 from here until the Hazelton area.

item.title: ID-25 East At US-93
item.description: ID-25 east at US-93.

item.title: ID-25 East at US-93
item.description: ID-25 east approaching US-93 - south to Twin Falls, north to Shoshone.

item.title: ID-25 East Approaching US-93
item.description: ID-25 east approaching US-93.

item.title: Jct. US-93 on ID-25 East
item.description: ID-25 east approaching US-93. A hawk is sitting on top of the Junction US-93 sign.

item.title: Lincoln Ave. North at ID-25
item.description: Lincoln Ave. north at ID-25 (Main St.). Use ID-25 west for I-84 access. This is the terminus of former ID-79. The ID-79 shield used to be in between the I-84 and ID-25 shields.

item.title: Lincoln Ave. North at ID-25
item.description: Lincoln Ave. north (former ID-79) at ID-25 west to Wendell and Boise - east to Shoshone.

item.title: Jct. ID-25 on Lincoln Ave. North
item.description: Lincoln Ave (former ID-79) north approaching ID-25 in downtown Jerome.

item.title: I-84 East Exit 165
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 165, ID-25/Jerome

item.title: I-84 East Exit 201
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 201, ID-25 to Paul

item.title: I-84 East Exit 216
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 216, ID-77/ID-25 junction

item.title: I-84 West at Exit 216 - ID-77/ID-25 Jct.
item.description: I-84 west Exit 216 offramp at ID-77/ID-25. Use ID-25 west for Rupert; use ID-77 south for Albion.

item.title: ID-25 West - Minidoka County
item.description: ID-25 west (South 200 East) at Baseline Road. Turn left to continue west on ID-25 towards Rupert and MInidoka.

item.title: ID-25 West at ID-24
item.description: ID-25 west at ID-24. Use ID-24 west for Minidoka. Merge left for ID-24/ID-25 west to Heyburn and I-84. ID-24 and ID-25 join through Rupert.
